knimeNode.name: Patcher
knimeNode.shortDescription: Cuts images into patches of mainly the same size

fullDescription.intro:
Cuts image into the number of patches that is selected. Most of the patches have the same size but the last in each row and column can be slightly smaller. There are two options to define the number of patches
Define the total number of patches in powers of 2.
Define the number of patches for the first and second dimension (minimum number is 1).

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select the column containing the image to be patched.

Select how you want to define the number of patches.
Select total number of patches (in powers of 2)
Select number of patches for the first and second dimension
The image will be cut into 2 to the power of the number you select
